qas.question: Which nationalist movement arose in the early 20th century?
Which other movement was it modeled after?
Which magazine advocated for Galician nationalism?

context: In the early 20th century came another turn toward nationalist politics with <a0_0>Solidaridad Gallega<a0_0/> (1907–1912) modeled on <a1_0>Solidaritat Catalana<a1_0/> in Catalonia. Solidaridad Gallega failed, but in 1916 <a2_0>Irmandades da Fala<a2_0/> (Brotherhood of the Language) developed first as a cultural association but soon as a full-blown nationalist movement. Vicente Risco and Ramón Otero Pedrayo were outstanding cultural figures of this movement, and the magazine <a3_0>Nós<a3_0/> ('Us'), founded 1920, its most notable cultural institution, Lois Peña Novo the outstanding political figure.
